titles.title: Providing for consideration of the bill (H.R. 1862) to amend the Federal Food, Drug, and Cosmetic Act to provide greater access to affordable pharmaceuticals.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Rules.
Motion to Discharge Committee filed by Mrs. Thurman. Petition No: 107-11.

bill.summary: 9/5/2002--Introduced. Sets forth the rule (open) for the consideration of H.R. 1862 (greater access to affordable pharmaceuticals).
